summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 15105 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Holgate Street, in the City of Seattle from 17th Avenue South to 31st Avenue South, by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 339 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency", approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
